<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#14929](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/14929.html) (net: Allow connections from misbehavior ban

Closing this one. Am providing another pull request with the minimal change set.\n\nNote: Jsut reviewed. The conflicts with other pull requests are related exclusively to the application of clang format. Will create a pull request with clang format exclusively for my changed lines.
We run https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/tree/master/contrib/devtools#clang-format-diffpy only on the diff and not the whole file.
Hi MarkoFalke. I am afraid, appveyor will reject a file that is not fully formatted according to clang rules. Better bite the bullet now?
We don't check formatting in appveyor. Do you have a failing build to link to?
